query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operatedeptid in (@revDeptId@) and status=1 and (mainifrecord is null or mainifrecord=0) and est.operatedeptid is not null

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.senddeptid,est.mainexecuteenddate from est_circuitdispatch est where est.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operatedeptid=@s1@ and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.operatedeptid is not null

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.sendtime>'@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operatedeptid in (@revDeptId@) and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.OPERATETYPE=113 and est.operatetime>est.mainexecuteenddate and est.operatedeptid is not null

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.senddeptid,est.mainexecuteenddate from est_circuitdispatch est where est.sendtime>'@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operatedeptid=@s1@ and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.OPERATETYPE=113 and est.operatetime>est.mainexecuteenddate and est.operatedeptid is not null

select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.senddeptid,est.mainexecuteenddate from est_circuitdispatch est where est.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operatedeptid =@s1@ and status=1 and (mainifrecord is null or mainifrecord=0) and est.mainid not in (select distinct est1.mainid from est_circuitdispatch est1 where est1.sendtime>'@beginTime@' and est1.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est1.operatedeptid=@s1@ and est1.status=1 and (est1.mainifrecord is null or est1.mainifrecord=0) and est1.OPERATETYPE=113 and est1.operatetime>est1.mainexecuteenddate) and est.operatedeptid is not null

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.senddeptid,est.mainexecuteenddate from est_circuitdispatch est where est.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operateroleid=@s1@ and est.status=1 and (est.mainifrecord is null or est.mainifrecord=0) and est.operateroleid is not null

select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.senddeptid,est.mainexecuteenddate from est_circuitdispatch est where est.sendtime>='@beginTime@' and est.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est.operateroleid=@s1@ and status=1 and (mainifrecord is null or mainifrecord=0) and est.mainid not in (select distinct est1.mainid from est_circuitdispatch est1 where est1.sendtime>'@beginTime@' and est1.sendtime<'@endTime@' and est1.operateroleid=@s1@ and est1.status=1 and (est1.mainifrecord is null or est1.mainifrecord=0) and est1.OPERATETYPE=113 and est1.operatetime>est1.mainexecuteenddate ) and est.operateroleid is not null
